sql-statement.sql: select tablename from pg_tables where tablename not like 'pg%' and tablename not like 'sql_%'
select column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = ?

select tbl.tablename, des.objsubid, des.description from pg_tables as tbl inner join pg_class c ON tbl.tablename = c.relname left join pg_description as des ON c.oid = des.objoid where tbl.schemaname != 'pg_catalog' AND tbl.schemaname != 'information_schema' and tbl.tablename = ? order by des.objsubid asc

WITH RECURSIVE ptTree AS ( SELECT * FROM pt_station WHERE (parentstationids is null or parentstationids = '') union ALL SELECT pt_station.* FROM pt_station, ptTree WHERE pt_station.parentstationids = ptTree.ids ) SELECT * FROM ptTree
